hadiths.text: Abdullah b 'Abbas reported that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) had said:If I live till the next (year), I would definitely observe fast on the 9th, and the narration transmitted by Abu Bakr is:" He meant the day of Ashura

chapter.ara-name: باب أَىُّ يَوْمٍ يُصَامُ فِي عَاشُورَاءَ
chapter.eng-name: Which day should be fasted for 'Ashura?
